archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0283
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to easily compare Vodafone services to what I'm currently using and paying , so that I can decide if I want to purchase it.

properties.value: It's only about a clear summary screen with all the charges related to the selected purchase. Transition from legacy VF offers handled in transition usecases.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
